DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety tolerability XL820 give orally adult advance solid tumor .
DOC.brief_title: Study XL820 Adults With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Advanced solid tumor Cancer standard therapy exist longer effective Life expectancy > 3 month Adequate bone marrow , liver , kidney function Willing use accept method contraception course study Negative pregnancy test ( female ) Written informed consent Chemotherapy within 46 week start treatment ( depend therapy ) Radiotherapy 25 % bone marrow within 4 week start treatment Investigational drug within 30 day start treatment Subjects know brain metastasis Uncontrolled medical disorder infection cardiovascular disease Subjects know HIV positive Pregnant breastfeeding woman
